summary: A suite of unit tests that validate the behavior of various AWS Bedrock API operations, including model customization jobs, custom model management, tagging, and listing functionalities, using mocked AWS services and frozen time to simulate different scenarios and edge cases.
business_intent: To verify that the Bedrock client correctly handles creation, retrieval, deletion, and management of models and jobs, enforces constraints, processes pagination and sorting, and responds appropriately to error conditions, thereby ensuring reliable integration with AWS Bedrock services.
